translation:
Piratini, October 26, 1838.

Most Illustrious Sir,

Antônio José Bonilha is hereby dispatched with the purpose of loading some carts with the flour seized on the “Mineira” sumaca; therefore may Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency Secretariat of Finance in Piratini, October 26, 1838.

Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, General Commander of Police of Boqueirão. Domingos José de Almeida

Official letter from the Excellency dated October 26, received on November 1.

Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães General Commander of Police of Boqueirão From the Ministry of Finance
